item.title: Understanding Dynamic Linking in C++
item.author: mfer32@gmail.com
item.description: If you’ve ever used C or C ++ for sure you’ve had to use methods that make your job easier, no one likes to re-invent the wheel (unless you’re a caveman). And is that many times we find cases where we have to do the calculation of a square root with sqrt, or we just want to use printf to print a message on the screen.
